metadata.name: Google Calendar
metadata.description: Atomic actions operating with Google Calendar.

post.description: Creates a new event in the specified calendar.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A short summary of the event's purpose.

location.title: Location
location.description: The physical location of the event.

description.title: Description
description.description: A more detailed description of the event.

dateTime.title: Datetime
dateTime.description: The start or end time of the event.

timeZone.title: Timezone
timeZone.description: The time zone in which the time is specified, formatted as IANA Time Zone Database. For single events this field is optional.

start.description: The (inclusive) start time of the event.

dateTime.title: Datetime
dateTime.description: The start or end time of the event.

timeZone.title: Timezone
timeZone.description: The time zone in which the time is specified, formatted as IANA Time Zone Database. For single events this field is optional.

end.description: The (exclusive) end time of the event.

recurrence.title: Recurrence
recurrence.description: A list of RRULE, EXRULE, RDATE, and EXDATE lines for a recurring event.

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the attendee.

displayName.title: Displayname
displayName.description: The display name of the attendee.

optional.title: Optional
optional.description: Whether this is an optional attendee.

responseStatus.title: Responsestatus
responseStatus.description: The response status of the attendee.

organizer.title: Organizer
organizer.description: Whether the attendee is the organizer of the event.

useDefault.title: Usedefault
useDefault.description: Indicates whether to use the default reminders.

method.title: Method
method.description: The method of the reminder (email or popup).

minutes.title: Minutes
minutes.description: The number of minutes before the event when the reminder should occur.

overrides.title: Overrides
overrides.description: A list of overrides for the reminders.

event.title: Event
event.description: JSON representation of the Google Calendar V3 event.

calendar_id.title: Calendar Id
calendar_id.description:
Calendar identifier which can be found by listing all calendars action.
Default value is "primary" which indicates the calendar where the user is currently logged in.

post.description:
List all events in the user's primary calendar between the given dates.
To aggregate all events across calendars, call this method for each calendar returned by list_calendars endpoint.

calendar_id.title: Calendar Id
calendar_id.description:
Calendar identifier which can be found by listing all calendars action.
Default value is "primary" which indicates the calendar where the user is currently logged in.

query.title: Query
query.description:
Free text search terms to find events that match these terms in summary, description, location,
attendee's name / email or working location information.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description:
Upper bound (exclusive) for an event's start time to filter by.
Must be an RFC3339 timestamp with mandatory time zone offset.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description:
Lower bound (exclusive) for an event's end time to filter by.
Must be an RFC3339 timestamp with mandatory time zone offset.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A short summary of the event's purpose.

location.title: Location
location.description: The physical location of the event.

description.title: Description
description.description: A more detailed description of the event.

useDefault.description: Indicates whether to use the default reminders.

minutes.description: The number of minutes before the event when the reminder should occur.

overrides.title: Overrides
overrides.description: A list of overrides for the reminders.

result.description: The result for the action if it ran successfully

error.title: Error
error.description: The error message if the action failed for some reason

schema.title: Response for List Events
schema.description: A list of calendar events that match the query, if defined.

post.description: List all calendars that the user is subscribed to.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: The name or summary of the calendar.

timeZone.title: Timezone
timeZone.description: The timezone the calendar is set to, such as 'Europe/Bucharest'.

selected.title: Selected
selected.description: A boolean indicating if the calendar is selected by the user in their UI.

accessRole.title: Accessrole
accessRole.description: The access role of the user with respect to the calendar, e.g., 'owner'.

result.description: The result for the action if it ran successfully

error.title: Error
error.description: The error message if the action failed for some reason

post.description: Update an existing Google Calendar event with dynamic arguments.

event_id.title: Event Id
event_id.description: Identifier of the event to update. Can be found by listing events in all calendars.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A short summary of the event's purpose.

location.title: Location
location.description: The physical location of the event.

description.title: Description
description.description: A more detailed description of the event.

dateTime.title: Datetime
dateTime.description: The start or end time of the event.

timeZone.title: Timezone
timeZone.description: The time zone in which the time is specified, formatted as IANA Time Zone Database. For single events this field is optional.

start.description: The (inclusive) start time of the event.

dateTime.title: Datetime
dateTime.description: The start or end time of the event.

timeZone.title: Timezone
timeZone.description: The time zone in which the time is specified, formatted as IANA Time Zone Database. For single events this field is optional.

end.description: The (exclusive) end time of the event.

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the attendee.

displayName.title: Displayname
displayName.description: The display name of the attendee.

optional.title: Optional
optional.description: Whether this is an optional attendee.

responseStatus.title: Responsestatus
responseStatus.description: The response status of the attendee.

organizer.title: Organizer
organizer.description: Whether the attendee is the organizer of the event.

attendees.title: Attendees
attendees.description: A list of attendees consisting in email and whether they are mandatory to participate or not.

updates.title: Updates
updates.description:
A dictionary containing the event attributes to update.
Possible keys include 'summary', 'description', 'start', 'end', and 'attendees'.

calendar_id.title: Calendar Id
calendar_id.description:
Identifier of the calendar where the event is.
Default value is "primary" which indicates the calendar where the user is currently logged in.
